about.summary: sidetable builds simple but useful summary tables of your data

name: sidetable
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "sidetable" %}
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 44695ab38e7e166664bf79cf5af23f4360f4d9a5e17114b5ebc4a6908f8be3d9

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - pandas >=1.0
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - sidetable
  requires:
    - pytest
    - seaborn

about:
  home: "https://github.com/chris1610/sidetable"
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "sidetable builds simple but useful summary tables of your data"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - chris1610
